AbsoluteForm.NAME: Absolute Form
AbsoluteForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the amount of half damage dealt. NL At the start of each turn, give all enemies 1 Strength.
AbsoluteForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain Block equal to the amount of half damage dealt. NL At the start of each turn, give all enemies 1 Strength.

AbsoluteStrike.NAME: Absolute Strike
AbsoluteStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each untriggered Trap on the field.

AbsoluteWill.NAME: Absolute Will
AbsoluteWill.DESCRIPTION: Enemies with SeriousInjury take additional 50% non-attack damage. NL Apply !M! SeriousInjury to all enemies.

AutoAttack.NAME: CounterAttack
AutoAttack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times.

Rupture.NAME: Rupture
Rupture.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL If held at the end of the turn, add a copy of this card to the discard pile.

BloodOfGhost.NAME: Blood of Ghost
BloodOfGhost.DESCRIPTION: When you lose HP, lose !M! less HP.
BloodOfGhost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you lose HP, lose !M! less HP.

BreakFreeFromFate.NAME: Break Free From Fate
BreakFreeFromFate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn.

Mediate.NAME: Mediate
Mediate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw an additional !M! cards next turn.

BrowseDebris.NAME: Browse Debris
BrowseDebris.DESCRIPTION: Choose and play !M! cards from the draw pile. NL Exhaust.
BrowseDebris.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose and play !M! cards from the draw pile.

BurnTheBoat.NAME: Burn The Boat
BurnTheBoat.DESCRIPTION: For each other Attack card in your hand, deal !D! damage.

BuryTheHatchet.NAME: Bury the Hatchet
BuryTheHatchet.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all status and curse cards from the discard pile. NL For each card Exhausted, draw a card.
BuryTheHatchet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all status and curse cards from the discard pile. NL For each card Exhausted, draw a card.

PackAndTakeAway.NAME: Pack and Take Away~
PackAndTakeAway.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Fatal, gain an extra card reward after the battle. NL Exhaust.

Ceremony.NAME: Ceremony
Ceremony.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add an *Exorcise card to your hand.
Ceremony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add an *Exorcise card to your hand.

CrossChop.NAME: Cross Chop
CrossChop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal additional damage every other turn.

Crossroad.NAME: Crossroad
Crossroad.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Rupture to your hand.
Crossroad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Rupture to your discard pile.

Cure.NAME: Fight on!
Cure.DESCRIPTION: If your HP is below half of your max HP, gain !M! *Regeneration. NL Exhaust.

CutEvilSword.NAME: Onigari No Ryuuou
CutEvilSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL At the start of each turn, the number of damage times of this card increase by 1.

RiverAgainstCurrent.NAME: River Against the Current
RiverAgainstCurrent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL ResetDebris.

PatronSaint.NAME: Patron Saint of Hinamizawa
PatronSaint.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have not used any cards this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

Exorcise.NAME: Exorcise
Exorcise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
Exorcise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Ethereal.

EyeOfReincarnation.NAME: Eye of Reincarnation
EyeOfReincarnation.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the amount of HP you have lost. NL Exhaust.

FakeGod.NAME: Fake Miko
FakeGod.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. After 2 turns, add 2 copies of that card to your hand. NL Trap. Exhaust.

FlowerOfNerull.NAME: Flower of Nerull
FlowerOfNerull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! cards from the discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

BirthdayGift.NAME: Birthday Gift from Rika
BirthdayGift.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, deal !M! damage to the attacker. NL Trap.

Guarder.NAME: Guarder
Guarder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block for each enemy present.

HangTrap.NAME: Hang Trap
HangTrap.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack card and have at least one negative effect, remove all your negative effects. NL Trap. Exhaust.
HangTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next time you receive a negative effect, negate it and draw !M! cards. NL Trap.

HoleTrap.NAME: Pitfall
HoleTrap.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next instance of damage you would take this turn. NL Trap. Exhaust.
HoleTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next instance of damage you would take this turn. NL Trap.

Cheat.NAME: Cheat
Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! extra cards next turn. NL Trap.

KeepWatcher.NAME: Keep Watcher
KeepWatcher.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. Gain !B! Block. NL Each time a Trap is triggered, reduce the cost of this card by 1 for the rest of the combat.
Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Next turn, draw an additional card equal to its cost + 1.

MagicTrap.NAME: Magic Trap
MagicTrap.DESCRIPTION: For each Trap card in your deck, after 1 turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Trap.

MemoryOfPriorLife.NAME: Fragments of Time
MemoryOfPriorLife.DESCRIPTION: ResetDebris. NL Retain up to !M! card.

MemoryOfReincarnation.NAME: Memory of Reincarnation
MemoryOfReincarnation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Every time you ResetDebris, gain !M! Dexterity.

Minagoro.NAME: Minagoro
Minagoro.DESCRIPTION: After !M! turns, deal 26 damage to all enemies and draw 2 cards. NL Trap.

MiracleEpitaph.NAME: Miracle Barrier
MiracleEpitaph.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL At the start of each turn, this card's base block value increases by !M!.

MiracleForm.NAME: Miracle Form
MiracleForm.DESCRIPTION: Double the damage you deal. NL If you take unblocked attack damage, this effect expires for the next turn.
MiracleForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double all damage you deal. NL If you take unblocked attack damage, this effect expires for the next turn.

MiracleStrike.NAME: Miracle Strike
MiracleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target enemy intends to attack, ResetDebris.

OceanOfDebris.NAME: Ocean of Debris
OceanOfDebris.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each different card category in your hand.

Onikaku.NAME: Onikaku
Onikaku.DESCRIPTION: Mark an enemy. After 3 turns, deal !M! damage to it. NL Trap.

Oracle.NAME: Oracle
Oracle.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. Retain your block this turn. NL ResetDebris. NL Exhaust.
Oracle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. Retain your block this turn. NL ResetDebris. NL Exhaust.

OyashiroHaunt.NAME: Oyashiro's Haunting
OyashiroHaunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Syndrome. NL Exhaust.

GhostCard.NAME: Ghost Card
GhostCard.DESCRIPTION: After !M! turns, add a *Time Freeze to your hand. NL Trap. Exhaust.

Promise.NAME: Promise
Promise.DESCRIPTION: If you have not used any attack cards this turn, gain !B! block X times.

PunishTime.NAME: Punishment Moment
PunishTime.DESCRIPTION: Add all Trap cards from the draw pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

PurifyEvil.NAME: Purify Evil
PurifyEvil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Remove all enemies' Syndromes. For each layer removed, gain !M! Dexterity.

Sorry.NAME: Sorry!
Sorry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL If the target's Syndrome reaches LV3, immediately increase it to LV5. Otherwise, apply !M! Syndrome.

Suspicion.NAME: Suspicion
Suspicion.DESCRIPTION: After 1 turn, apply !M! SeriousInjury and Weak to all enemies. NL Trap. Exhaust.

Takoroshi.NAME: Takoroshi
Takoroshi.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is not killed, add 2 *Dazed to your discard pile.

TragedyCycleTrap.NAME: Tragic Cycle
TragedyCycleTrap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of the next turn, deal !M! damage to all enemies. NL Trap.

TrapMaster.NAME: Trap Master
TrapMaster.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! block every time you place a Trap.

Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, reduce the remaining turns of all timed Traps by !M!.

ChainTrap.NAME: Chain Trap
ChainTrap.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card each time a Trap is triggered.

SandGlass.NAME: Hourglass
SandGlass.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reduce the remaining turns of all timed Trap by !M!.
SandGlass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reduce the remaining turns of all timed Trap by 1.

Matsuribaya.NAME: Matsuribaya
Matsuribaya.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you ResetDebris, reduce the energy cost of this card by 1 for the rest of the combat.

TwilightOfMiracle.NAME: Twilight
TwilightOfMiracle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, if you have no FreeAttack, gain 1 FreeAttack.

Watanagashi.NAME: Watanagashi
Watanagashi.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a *Rupture to your draw pile.

Haunt.NAME: Haunt
Haunt.DESCRIPTION: Mark an enemy. After 1 turn, deal !M! damage to it. NL Trap.

PendantTrap.NAME: Pendant Trap
PendantTrap.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the next turn, deal !M! damage to all enemies. If the battle is not over, deal the same amount of damage to the player. NL Trap.
PendantTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of the next turn, deal !M! damage to all enemies. If the battle is not over, deal the same amount of damage to the player. NL Trap.

QueenInfected.NAME: Queen Infected
QueenInfected.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a status or curse card, apply 1 Syndrome to all enemies.

Recall.NAME: Recall
Recall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of the turn, return this card from the discard pile to your hand.

SnapFinger.NAME: Snap Finger
SnapFinger.DESCRIPTION: Immediately trigger all your timed Trap. NL Add a *Insight to your draw pile.
SnapFinger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Immediately trigger all your timed Trap. NL Add a *Insight+ to your draw pile.

Spike.NAME: Spike
Spike.DESCRIPTION: Mark an enemy. After 1 turn, deal !M! damage to it and add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Trap.

TimeFreeze.NAME: Time Freeze
TimeFreeze.DESCRIPTION: ResetDebris. NL Next turn, draw an additional !M! cards, gain additional [E][E]. NL Exhaust.

TwinFlower.NAME: Twin Flower
TwinFlower.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards or gain energy until your hand size matches your energy count. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
TwinFlower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards or gain energy until your hand size matches your energy count. NL Exhaust.

TwinTrick.NAME: Twin Trick
TwinTrick.DESCRIPTION: This turn, the next !M! Trap cards you play will be played twice.
